statements: SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, message FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT timestamp, sender_id, receiver_id FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender_id > 100 AND receiver_id < 50;
SELECT message FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, COUNT(receiver_id) AS receiver_count FROM CommunicationRecords GROUP BY sender_id HAVING receiver_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords ORDER BY receiver_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_phone FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_address='123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_phone FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_dob FROM patients;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT comm_id, sender_id, receiver_id, comm_timestamp FROM communications;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT provider_name, provider_email, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE LENGTH(provider_phone) > 0;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE sender_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE patient_dob < '1980-01-01');

SELECT patients.patient_name, communications.message_text, communications.comm_timestamp FROM patients JOIN communications ON patients.patient_id = communications.sender_id ORDER BY communications.comm_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, email_address FROM healthcare_providers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type='Hospital';
SELECT provider_name, email_address FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND phone_number LIKE '999%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension' AND prescription='Medication A' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_purpose FROM appointments WHERE provider_id=1 AND patient_id=3 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status <> 'Cancelled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND receiver_id = '987e6543-abcd-21e5-b678-098765432100';
